documentation.text: @notice get an address of a registered erc20 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc20 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc20 tokens
@notice get an address of a registered erc721 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc721 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc721 tokens
@notice get an address of a registered erc1155 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc1155 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc1155 tokens
@notice get an address of a registered erc20 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc20 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc20 tokens
@notice get an address of a registered erc721 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc721 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc721 tokens
@notice get an address of a registered erc1155 tokens
@notice get an array of all registered erc1155 tokens
@notice get count of all registered erc1155 tokens

registerTokenERC1155(string,string,addre.details: - Token name and address can't be already registered          - Length of token name can't be higher than 25

params.tokenContractAddress: Contract address of the ERC1155 Token
params.tokenURI: URI of the token to be registered

registerTokenERC20(string,string,address.details: - Token name and address can't be already registered          - Length of token name can't be higher than 25

params.tokenContractAddress: Contract address of the ERC20 Token
params.tokenName: Name of the token to be registered (e.g.: DAI, UNI)

registerTokenERC721(string,string,addres.details: - Token name and address can't be already registered          - Length of token name can't be higher than 25

params.tokenContractAddress: Contract address of the ERC721 Token
params.tokenName: Name of the token to be registered

getAllErc1155Count().notice: get count of all registered erc1155 tokens

getAllErc1155Registered().notice: get an array of all registered erc1155 tokens

getAllErc20Count().notice: get count of all registered erc20 tokens

getAllErc20Registered().notice: get an array of all registered erc20 tokens

getAllErc721Count().notice: get count of all registered erc721 tokens

getAllErc721Registered().notice: get an array of all registered erc721 tokens

getErc1155AddressRegistered(string).notice: get an address of a registered erc1155 tokens

getErc20AddressRegistered(string).notice: get an address of a registered erc20 tokens

getErc721AddressRegistered(string).notice: get an address of a registered erc721 tokens

registerTokenERC1155(string,string,addre.notice: Register the contract address of an ERC1155 Token

registerTokenERC20(string,string,address.notice: Register the contract address of an ERC20 Token

registerTokenERC721(string,string,addres.notice: Register the contract address of an ERC721 Token
